front.title: LDP Extensions for Pseudowire Binding to LSP Tunnels

abstract.t: Many transport services require that user traffic, in the form of Pseudowires (PW), be delivered on a single co-routed bidirectional tunnel or two tunnels that share the same routes. This document defines an optional extension to LDP that enables the binding between PWs and the underlying TE tunnels. The extension applies to both SS- PW and MS-PW.
